text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock @MattHancock fell into the politicians' trap of creating an arbitary target and then is inevitably held to it. I really don't think that the general public care if the target was hit or not. They want a safe end to the lockdown and to know front-line workers have PPE #newmidlands
